Lord Slynn of Hadley Lord Steyn Lord Hoffmann Lord Hutton Lord Hobhouse OPINIONSOFTHELORDSOFAPPEALFORJUDGMENTINTHECAUSE ABDULRAHMAN MOHAMED (RESPONDENT) v THE LONDON BOROUGH OF HAMMERSMITH & FULHAM (APPELLANTS)ON 1 NOVEMBER 2001 [2001] UKHL 57

P.SENT: This appeal raises questions under the Housing Act 1996 ("the Act") which Henry LJ in the Court of Appeal below [2001] QB 97, 101, para 1 said frequently arose but had not then been resolved by that court.
